targets.expr: count(count by (hostname)(cpu_usage_user{job=~"$consul"}>80  or cpu_usage_sys{job=~"$consul"}>80 or cpu_usage_wait{job=~"$consul"}>80 or cpu_usage_steal{job=~"$consul"}>80 or mem_used_percent{job=~"$consul"}>90))

count(probe_success{job="blackbox_haproxy_availability",tenancy=~"$consul"} == 0 or probe_success{job="blackbox_haproxy_login",tenancy=~"$consul"} == 0 or (sum without (hostname)(pmserv_files_failed{job=~"$consul"}) / (sum without (hostname)(pmserv_files_collected{job=~"$consul"})+sum without (hostname)(pmserv_files_failed{job=~"$consul"})) >0.8) or (avg(pmserv_rop_collection_time{job="$consul"}) >780) or (max(pmserv_rop_collection_time{job="$consul"}) >890) or (cm_status{exported_job="pushgateway",job="pushgateway",tenancy="$consul",type="sync_percent"} <80) or (dp_total_number_of_hb_to_sas{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+dpmediation-0"} == 0 and ON(job)(dp_total_number_of_hb_to_sas{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+dpmediation-1"} ==0) and ON(job)(dp_grant_request_count{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"} ==0) and ON(job)(dp_hb_request_count{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"} ==0) and ON(job)(dp_spectrum_inquiry_request_count{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"} ==0) and ON(job)(dp_relinquishment_requests_count{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"} ==0) and ON(job)(dp_registration_requests_count{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"} ==0)) or (idelta(dp_failed_attempts_with_sas{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+dpmediation.*"}[2m]) >0) or (idelta(dp_failed_connection_attempts_with_sas_incremental{job=~"$consul",hostname=~".+domainproxy-0"}[2m]) >0))
